name: Button Mix
description:
Welcome to Button Mix, the bright and catchy world of fashion, stylish outfits, and match-3 puzzles from Nika Entertainment, the developer of other candy puzzle adventures, such as Fairy Mix!

Together with the beautiful seamstress Sophie, discover the history of fashion from the early 1900s to nowadays, and try on dozens of amazing garments!
-Collect thousands of colorful buttons by matching of them three in a row!
-Combine the special buttons into striking combinations using up to five elements in a row!
-Solve puzzles completing hundreds of levels!
-Enjoy explosive effects of super combinations!

Help Sophie find her way in the world of fashion:
-Arrange stunning fashion shows and demonstrate outfits from different epochs
-Collect resources and make dresses to get exciting bonuses for the game
-Unlock helpful items from the tailor shop and use them to pass levels

In Button Mix, you can visit dozens of locations — from exquisite 1900s to chic and glamorous 2000s, from China to Peru! You will have a unique chance to explore the whole variety of styles belonging to different epochs and countries.

And don't forget about your friends!
-Help your friends win by sending them additional lives
-Give them gifts that will help them complete new match-3 levels.

Do you like King or SGN games? Then you’ll definitely love Button Mix!

Go to the Nika Entertainment website to learn more about other colorful candy puzzle three in a row adventure games:
nikaent.com

And don’t forget to “like” the game on Facebook:
https://www.facebook.com/buttonmix/

Button Mix is a free to play match-3 game, but you can always buy extra lives and moves
